 2020-02402020-04-07,  ,  ,  ,  ISC
ActIndian Act
First Nations Elections Act
SubjectFirst Nations Election Cancellation and Postponement Regulations (Prevention of Diseases)
PrecisFIRST NATIONS ELECTION CANCELLATION AND POST-PONEMENT REGULATIONS (PREVENTION OF DISEASES) in order to provide First Nations councils whose mandates are to expire in the coming months with the possibility to extend their mandate for a limited period of time in order to avoid the spreading of disease.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0084 Publication Date: 2020-04-29
AttachmentsAttachment
